attributes.action: Ban the purchase of cigarettes to people born after 1st Janurary 2000
attributes.additional_details:
The sale of tobacco products should be made illegal to those born after 1st Janurary 2000.
Right now it is (as they aer not yet 18), however, we can create a smoking free generation, and those to follow.

rejection.details: Please see: Prohibit smoking for post-millennium birth dates.
